titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: I celebrated at 8 a.m.: preached at All Saints, Ennismore Gardens at 11 a.m. and in S. Margaret's at 7 p.m., when there was a large congregation, including Raleigh, who came in to supper.
